demoExpired.title: Демо истек
demoExpired.canUpgrade: Спасибо за попытку демо Sandstorm!  Срок действия вашей учётной записи демо истека.  Если вы хотите продолжить использовать Sandstorm  и сделать свою учетную запись постоянной, войдите в систему.
demoExpired.cannotUpgrade: Спасибо за попытку демо Sandstorm!  Ваш аккаунт демо истек.

demoModal.withoutAppDemo: со всеми приложениями, которые вам нужны в одном месте.
demoModal.explanation: Sandstorm позволяет легко запускать приложения на вашем собственном сервере. В дополнение к улучшению конфиденциальности и контроля, это приносит приложения с открытым исходным кодом для более широкой аудитории.
demoModal.securityOverview: Sandstorm также смехотворно безопасен. Если вас интересует безопасность, ознакомьтесь с обзором модели безопасности Sandstorm.

signup.title: Претензия приглашение

signedUp.keyIsUsedWithOrigin: Вы успешно зарегистрировались! Теперь устанобите некоторые приложения.
signedUp.keyIsNotUsed: Похоже, у вас есть уже учётная запись, поэтому вам не нужен этот ключ регистрации.

signup.keyIsUsed: Извините.  Этот ключ регистрации уже использовался.
signup.signInGuide: Сначала вы должны войти в систему.  Нажмите кнопку «Войти» в правом верхнем углу.
signup.invalidKey: Извините.  Это не действительный ключ регистрации.

uploadStatus.title: Загрузка…
uploadStatus.uploadFailed: Не удалось загрузить.  Пожалуйста, попробуйте ещё раз.

uploadTest.title: Пробная страница для загрузки
uploadTest.explanation: Эта страница предназначена для использования тестовыми сценариями.

isPaid.title: Получить до 30 ГБ хранения данных, когда ваши друзья делятся на Oasis!
isPaid.explanation: За каждого друга, который создаёт ссылку для обмена, мы вознаградим вас 2 ГБ.

isNotPaid.title: Полутите неограниченное количество песчинок и до 2 ГБ хранения данных, когда ваши друзья делятся на Oasis!
isNotPaid.explanation: За каждого друга, который создаёт ссылку для обмена, мы вознаградим вас 50 МБ.  Вы также получите неограниченное количество песчинок.

howTo.title: Разделение—направление
howTo.explanation: Чтобы начать, откройте лубую песчинку и нажмите «Поделиться доступом».

getStart.step1: Вы поделитесь песчинкой с вашим другом (который ещё не использует Oasis).
getStart.step3: Ваш друг делится песчинкой с лубым человеком (включая вас).

status.title: *_Your referrals & status
status.explanation: *_Once you send a sharing link out, people will appear in this list after they sign in.

pending.title: *_Still needs to share
pending.explanation: *_Tell these people to make a grain and share it with you. You must actually view the grain they shared with you!

finePrint.title: *_The fine print
finePrint.warningWithAccountLink: *_Your referral bonus lasts until 1 year after the referral. The terms of this referral program may change without warning; however, such changes will not affect bonuses you have already received. If you need even more space, upgrade your account.
finePrint.explanation: *_Paid subscribers can get up to 30 GB of free storage, 2 GB per person they refer, in addition to the storage from their account level. Free account holders are not eligible for a referral bonus.

intro.explanation: *_Sandstorm.io is an open source hosting platform for personal/private instances of web apps. Users can upload and install arbitrary software through a simple app-store-like web interface. In addition to better privacy, this is the only way to make Open Source web apps viable.
intro.unofficialWarning: *_WARNING: This server is running an unofficial build of Sandstorm which may contain modifications not reviewed by the developers.

corporate.title: Корпоративные спонсоры
corporate.explanation: *_These companies contributed heavily to Sandstorm's crowdfunding campaign.

individual.title: *_Key indivisual sponsors
individual.explanation: *_These individuals contributed heavily to Sandstorm's crowdfunding campaign.

dependencies.title: *_Third-party works used
dependencies.explanation: *_These works are copyright the respective authors and used under the terms of the respective licenses.

copyright.title: Авторское право
copyright.license: *_The Sandstorm implementation is copyright by Sandstorm Development Group, Inc. and contributors. The implementation is licensed under the Apache License 2.0.
copyright.trademark: *_"Sandstorm" and the Sandstorm logo are trademarks of Sandstorm Development Group, Inc., and may not be used to advertise derivative works nor commercial services without written consent from Sandstorm Development Group, Inc.

grainView.quotaExhausted: *_Cannot start grain because owner's quota is exhausted. If this is your grain, please upgrade your subscription plan to continue.
grainView.openWithWhichIdentity: Вы бы предпочли раскрыть свою личность в этой песчинке или остаться анонимным?

grainInMyTrash.explanation: *_This grain is in your trash. You cannot access it unless you restore it to your main list.

grainInOwnersTrash.explanation: *_You can no longer access this grain because its owner has moved it to the trash.

grainOwnerSuspended.explanation: *_You can no longer access this grain because its owner's account has been suspended.

wrongIdentity.explanation: *_This link was intended for the user:

requestAccess.permissionDenied: *_You do not have permission to access this grain.
requestAccess.warnIdentityRevealing: *_Requesting access will reveal your identity to the grain owner.
requestAccess.waitForApproving: *_Your request has been sent. You will receive an email if your request is approved.

grainBackupPopup.title: Скачать резервную копию
grainBackupPopup.warning: Предупреждение!  Восстановление этой резервной копии может работать не так, как вы ожидайте.

grainApiTokenPopup.title: *_Webkeys
grainApiTokenPopup.copyForExternalApp: *_Copy this webkey and give it to the external app:
grainApiTokenPopup.description: *_A webkey allows you to connect an external app (e.g. a mobile app) to this app.

whoHasAccessPopup.title: *_Who has access
whoHasAccessPopup.noLoggedInUsers: *_No logged-in users have visited your links yet.

emailInviteTab.demoModeAlert: *_Sharing emails cannot be sent while in demo mode. Create an account to send sharing emails, or get a shareable link instead.

shareableLinkTab.withoutRoles: *_Anyone with this link can access the grain.
shareableLinkTab.labelExplanation: *_Use a label to remind yourself to whom you sent this unique link.

grainSharePopup.oldSharingModelDescription: *_This grain uses the old sharing model. You can share it by copy/pasting the URL from the location bar
grainSharePopup.upgradeDescription: *_You can upgrade this grain to the new model, but anyone with whom you shared this grain previously will lose access; you will have to share with them again.
grainSharePopup.signIn: *_For more sharing options, please sign in.

share.grainNotFoundWithId: Песчинка с идентификатором %s не была найдена.  Возможно, вам нужно войти в другую учёную запись.
share.signIn: Необходимо войти в систему чтобы предоставить доступ к песчинке.

trash.explanation: *_(Grains will be permanently removed after 30 days in the trash. To keep a grain, restore it to the Main list.)

noGrains.inTrash: *_Some grains in your trash match your search.
noGrains.hasApps: *_Select an app and create your first grain.
noGrains.hasNoApp: *_Install an app to create your first grain.

bulkAction.disabledHint: *_To perform bulk actions, you must first select some grains in the list.

mailingListBonusNotificationItem.explanationWithBonus: *_Subscribe to our announcement list and get %s bonus storage (1-2 emails per month).

referralNotificationItem.paidUser: *_Get up to 30 GB bonus with the
referralNotificationItem.unpaidUser: *_Unlimited grains & up to 2 GB bonus with the

adminNotificationItem.explanation: *_You can help Sandstorm by sending us some anonymous usage stats. Click here for more info.

identityChangesNotificationItem.explanation: *_We're changing the way identities work in Sandstorm. Your account may be affected. Click here to learn more.

emailVerifierPowerboxCard.verifyWithAnyService: *_Verify e-mail addresses using any login service

styleguide.title: *_Sandstorm style guide
styleguide.note: *_(note: this is a work in progress.)

copyRules.title: *_Copy rules
copyRules.rule1: *_Be terse but clear.  Avoid technical terms where less-technical ones will do.
copyRules.rule2: *_Capitalize the first letter of the first word of a section heading or button.  Do not capitalize the second word, or anything else, unless referring to a proper noun like Google or GitHub.
copyRules.rule3: *_Use verbs for text on buttons. The button text should describe what clicking that button will do.
copyRules.rule4: *_Use nouns for text which is a link.  The link text should indicate what the link will take you to.
copyRules.rule5: *_Use nouns for basically everything else, too, to communicate the information architecture. Section headings should be nouns which describe the content of the section.  Labels should be nouns which describe the content of the field.

styleRules.title: *_Style rules
styleRules.rule1: *_Stick to a limited color palette.  (TODO: add specific colors)
styleRules.rule2: *_Use typefaces no smaller than 13px for text content.  Readability is important and not everyone has young eyes.
styleRules.rule3: *_Make click targets no smaller than 32px square or 26px tall if appreciably wider.  Remember that due to Fitts' Law, larger click targets are easier to interact with.

forms.title: *_Forms
forms.rule2: *_The primary action button of a form should be at the bottom right of the form. Secondary buttons should line up to the left of that primary action button.
forms.rule3: *_When providing text input fields, place labels above the input, not side-by-side or inside the field as placeholder text.  Place additional explanation or instructions below the input. Placeholder text should be used for examples, not instructions.
forms.rule4: *_Forms are generally used for transactional interactions, where the user cares about the success or failure of the application.  Avoid optimistic UI in favor of multi-state UI which communicates network activity, success, and failure.  A common pattern is:
forms.rule4-1: *_Have the default state of the form.  Disable a save button until the user makes a change.
forms.rule4-2: *_When the user clicks an action button, start the RPC, and disable the entire form to indicate that the action is underway.
forms.rule4-3: *_When the RPC completes, if the RPC failed, show an error message at the top of the context over which the action applies.  If the RPC succeeded, either indicate a success message (again, at the top of the context over which the action applies) or if this was a modal interaction and the completion of the RPC indicates successful completion of the workflow, dismiss the form with no additional message.

newAdmin.title: *_Admin panel
newAdmin.wildcardHostBroken: *_WARNING: This server seems to have its WILDCARD_HOST misconfigured. Until you fix it, you will not be able to use any apps. You can read more info in the Sandstorm docs and in your browser's Javascript console. You'll need to adjust DNS, SSL/TLS certificates, or edit the sandstorm.conf file. If you see no information in the JS console, or wish to test if you have fixed the problem, reload this page to re-run the test. If you're still having problems, please file an issue.
newAdmin.websocketBroken: *_WARNING: This server seems to be unable to create a WebSocket. Sandstorm may appear to run fine, but many apps will fail to run properly. Learn more. Usually this is caused by a reverse proxy like nginx or Apache that needs to be reconfigured. If you think you are seeing this message in error, please reload this page or file an issue.
newAdmin.hasSetupToken: *_You are not logged in as an admin, but you do have a setup token. You can either visit the setup wizard or view the system log.
newAdmin.hasNoSetupToken: *_You are not logged in as an admin. To access the admin panel, log in as an admin user or generate a token from the command line by running `sandstorm admin-token`.

newAdminIdentity.explanation: *_Choose which services users may use to identify themselves.  Anyone can log in, but only users you invite will be able to install apps or create grains.
newAdminIdentity.organizationLinkPrefix: *_To configure organization membership and settings, see

adminIdentityProviderConfigureEmail.title: Настройки входа по электронной почте
adminIdentityProviderConfigureEmail.warning: *_Note: to use email login, you'll need to configure email delivery after this.
adminIdentityProviderConfigureEmail.explanation: Вход по электронной почте не имеет дополнительных параметров конфигурации.

googleLoginSetupInstructions.explanation: *_First, you'll need to get a Google Client ID. Follow these steps:
googleLoginSetupInstructions.step2: *_"Create Project", if needed. Wait for Google to finish provisioning.
googleLoginSetupInstructions.step3: *_On the left sidebar, go to "Credentials" and, on the right, "OAuth consent screen". Make sure to enter an email address and a product name, and save.
googleLoginSetupInstructions.step4: *_On the left sidebar, go to "Credentials".  Click the "Create credentials" button, then select "OAuth client ID" as the type.

adminIdentityProviderConfigureGoogle.title: *_Google login configuration
adminIdentityProviderConfigureGoogle.formerBaseUrlWarning: *_This server moved from __former__ to __current__. You'll need to visit https://console.developers.google.com/ and update the "Authorized Javascript Origins" and "Authorized Redirect URI" for this Client ID to include the values below.
adminIdentityProviderConfigureGoogle.explanation: *_Then, copy over your Client ID and Client secret below:

githubLoginSetupInstructions.explanation: *_First, you'll need to get a Github Client ID and Client secret. Follow these steps:

adminIdentityProviderConfigureGitHub.title: *_GitHub login configuration
adminIdentityProviderConfigureGitHub.formerBaseUrlWarning: *_This server moved from __former__ to __current__. You'll need to visit https://github.com/settings/developers and update the Homepage URL and Authorization callback URL for this application to the values below.
adminIdentityProviderConfigureGitHub.explanation: *_Then, copy over your Client ID and Client secret below:

searchBindDn.label: *_Bind user DN
searchBindDn.subtext: *_The DN to bind as when searching for a user in the tree, e.g. cn=admin,ou=users,dc=example,dc=com. Optional, but needed if your server doesn't allow unauthenticated searches.

searchBindPassword.label: *_Bind user password
searchBindPassword.subtext: *_Optional, needed if specifying bind DN above.

base.label: *_Base DN
base.subtext: *_The root object under which to search for user account nodes, e.g. ou=users,dc=example,dc=com

searchUsername.label: *_LDAP username attribute
searchUsername.subtext: *_The LDAP attribute on a user object which represents the user's username (what they will enter in the username field when signing in).

nameField.label: *_LDAP given name attribute
nameField.subtext: *_The LDAP attribute on a user object which represents the user's full display name.

emailField.label: *_LDAP email attribute
emailField.subtext: *_The LDAP attribute on a user object which represents the user's email address.

filter.label: *_Additional LDAP filter criteria
filter.subtext: *_An optional LDAP query fragment that will be included in the user search. This is not commonly used. See RFC2254.

caCert.label: *_LDAP CA certificate
caCert.subtext: *_This is only necessary if your server supports SSL and is using a private CA not in the common trusted set. Note that it does NOT work to enter the LDAP server's own certificate here -- it must be the certificate of a CA which has signed the LDAP server's certificate.

adminIdentityProviderConfigureSaml.title: *_SAML login configuration
adminIdentityProviderConfigureSaml.explanation: *_Your SAML IDP should be configured to return a persistent nameID. In addition, if you are not using Active Directory, you must configure your IDP to provide two extra attributes, email and displayName.
adminIdentityProviderConfigureSaml.serviceUrl: *_The Service URL of this server is: %s
adminIdentityProviderConfigureSaml.logoutUrl: *_The Service Logout URL of this server is: %s
adminIdentityProviderConfigureSaml.metadataUrlAt: *_If your SAML IDP supports reading the service provider metadata from a URL, then you can point it at: __text__

organization.name: *_Organization settings
organization.subtext: *_Smoother onboarding and collaboration for larger teams.

organizationSettingsBlurb.explanation: *_Sandstorm allows you to define an organization. You can automatically apply some settings to all members of your organization. Users within the organization will automatically be able to log in, install apps, and create grains.

emailToggle.label: *_Users authenticated via email address
emailToggle.subtext: *_Note: disabled because email login is not configured.

emailDomain.label: *_Domain:
emailDomain.subtext: *_Users with an email address at this domain will be members of this server's organization.

gappsToggle.label: *_Users authenticated via Google Apps for Work
gappsToggle.subtext: *_Note: disabled because Google login is not configured.

gappsDomain.label: *_Domain:
gappsDomain.subtext: *_Users with a Google Apps for Work account under this domain will be members of this server's organization.

ldapToggle.label: *_Users authenticated via LDAP
ldapToggle.subtext: *_Note: disabled because LDAP login is not configured.

samlToggle.label: *_Users authenticated via SAML
samlToggle.subtext: *_Note: disabled because SAML login is not configured.

disallowGuests.label: *_Disallow collaboration with users outside the organization.
disallowGuests.subtext: *_Users will be required to log in as a member of your organization to view sharing links. Guest access will be disabled.

shareContacts.label: *_Make all organization users visible to each other
shareContacts.subtext: *_This setting automatically adds users within the organization to each other's contact list so that they can share grains with each other.  Disable this if you have some users whose identity should stay hidden from other users.

outbound.title: *_Outbound email
outbound.warning: *_Email is unconfigured. Email-related features like email login, notifications, sharing invitations, and requesting access will be unavailable until you configure email.

howItWorks.title: *_How Sandstorm uses email
howItWorks.explanation: *_Sandstorm sends email notifications, and Sandstorm apps can send email notifications, too. Every app receives a unique email address, so Sandstorm needs to send email from a variety of "From:" addresses. Therefore, Gmail SMTP won't work, but there are other free services. See more info in the docs.

address.subtext: Используете порт 25 для SMTP (или незашифрованные или с StartTLS) или порт 465 для SMTPS TLS-шифрованием.

returnAddress.label: *_Sandstorm server's own email address
returnAddress.subtext: *_Sandstorm will send login emails, notifications of granted access requests, and other emails from this address. It will also use this address in the SMTP envelope.

emailDisablePopup.title: *_Really disable email?
emailDisablePopup.explanation: *_This will disable all outbound email delivery for this server, including sharing via email, email token login (if enabled), and email notifications to users.

personalization.name: *_Personalization
personalization.subtext: *_Customize a splash page, terms of service, privacy policy, etc.

serverTitle.label: *_Server title:
serverTitle.subtext: *_The name of this server, as used when communicating with users.

splashUrl.label: *_Splash URL (experimental):
splashUrl.subtext: *_This web page will be displayed in the background behind the login dialog (the home page when logged out). For security reasons, the page must be hosted within this Sandstorm server's wildcard host (otherwise it will be blocked by Content-Security-Policy). We suggest using a static web publishing app like Hacker CMS to host content.WARNING: This feature is experimental; in particular the style and positioning of the login box is subject to change without notice. Please let us know if you'd like to see it stabilize.

signupDialog.label: *_Signup dialog:
signupDialog.subtext: *_This text will be displayed to users who click on signup links.

termsOfService.label: *_Terms of service URL:
termsOfService.subtext: *_If provided, new users will be required to agree to the linked terms of service.

privacyPolicy.label: *_Privacy policy URL:
privacyPolicy.subtext: *_If provided, new users will be required to agree to the linked privacy policy.

useServerTitleForHomeText.label: *_Use server title (above) for home link
useServerTitleForHomeText.subtext: *_If enabled, changes the default label "Sandstorm" on the link at the very top left to match whatever you specified for the Server title above.

customLoginProviderName.label: *_Custom login button text
customLoginProviderName.subtext: *_Replaces the text "with LDAP" and "with SAML" on the login page with the specified text.

preinstalledApps.name: *_Pre-installed apps
preinstalledApps.subtext: *_Choose apps to pre-install for new users.

newAdminPreinstalledApps.explanation: *_Apps you configure on this page to be pre-installed will automatically be installed (show under /apps) for new users.

productivitySuite.label: *_Productivity Suite
productivitySuite.subtext: *_We recommend pre-installing these core apps that are useful to most users.

systemSuite.label: *_System apps
systemSuite.subtext: *_We recommend pre-installing these system apps that greatly enhance the abilities of Sandstorm.

allApps.label: *_All apps on market
allApps.subtext: *_The checked apps below will be installed by default for all new users.

appSources.name: *_App sources
appSources.subtext: *_Where to look for apps and app updates.

appMarketUrl.label: *_App market URL
appMarketUrl.subtext: *_The "Install..." button on the Apps page will link to this URL.

enableAppUpdates.label: *_Enable app update notifications
enableAppUpdates.subtext: *_Updates to apps will be automatically downloaded by the Sandstorm server daily and notifications sent to users asking if they want to update their installed apps.

appIndexUrl.label: *_App index URL
appIndexUrl.subtext: *_This is the URL that the Sandstorm server will check to learn about app updates.

ipBlacklist.label: *_Server-side request IP blacklist:
ipBlacklist.subtext: *_Users will be prohibited from making requests to these IP addresses. This includes making a request from an app, downloading an SPK file from a user-provided URL, etc. You may specify one IP address or network (in CIDR notation, e.g. "127.0.0.0/8") per line. The default value includes standard local and private network addresses. Note that when an HTTP proxy is in use, this setting may be ignored; the proxy must implement its own blacklist.

users.name: *_Users
users.subtext: *_Manage all users on this Sandstorm installation.

admin.label: *_Admin
admin.explanation: *_Manages all accounts.  Can install apps, create grains, and administer the server.

visitor.label: *_Visitor
visitor.explanation: *_Can use and re-share shared grains, but cannot create grains of their own nor install apps.

deletePopup.title: *_Delete %s
deletePopup.explanation: *_You are about to mark %s's account for deletion. Once marked for deletion, this account will be suspended, and admins will have 7 days to cancel the pending deletion by returning to this page and clicking the "Unsuspend Account" button. %s will not be able to stop this suspension/deletion.
deletePopup.detail: *_After 7 days, %s's account will be permanently deleted. Deleting this account will:
deletePopup.detail4: *_Delete all credentials owned by this account (except credentials also associated with another account).

suspendPopup.title: *_Suspend %s
suspendPopup.detail1: *_Prevent any grains created by %s from being opened
suspendPopup.detail3: *_This also applies to all credentials owned by this account (except credentials associated with another account)

newAdminUserInviteLink.explanation: *_You can invite others to create accounts on your server by giving them an account creation link. People you invite will be granted User permission and be able to install apps and create grains of their own. Alternatively, if you want to share a specific grain with someone, you can do that within the grain's "Share Access" menu.
newAdminUserInviteLink.title: *_Create a link

invite.explanation: *_This will create an account creation link which you can send to someone.

newAdminUserInviteEmail.title: *_Send an email

emailWarning.explanation: *_Email has not been configured, so sending invites via email is disabled.

newAdminUserInviteEmail.explanation: *_This will create a link and send it in an email.

body.label: *_Body:
body.subtext: *_$KEY will be replaced with the newly-generated link.

share.title: *_Publish anonymously to Sandstorm dev team
share.explanation: *_We'd like to know how many Sandstorm users there are, to make graphs and such.  Is it okay to send the numbers on this page once a day to the Sandstorm team, so that we can add them to the totals?  Any stats you send are anonymous.

control.explanation: *_The developers of Sandstorm like to know how many Sandstorm users there are, to make graphs and such.  You can help us by opting in to sharing the numbers on this page once a day to the Sandstorm team, so that we can add them to our totals. Any stats shared are submitted anonymously.
control.label: *_Anonymous stats reporting to sandstorm.io:

json.title: *_View as JSON
json.explanation: *_If you want to integrate Sandstorm stats with an internal stats tool, use this secret link to retrieve the tables below as JSON. You can revoke the current link at any time by generating a new link.
json.label: *_Stats JSON link:

newAdminMaintenance.explanation: *_You can set a maintenance message which will be shown to all users in the menu bar, on the top right. This is useful for announcing scheduled maintenance so users can be prepared to tolerate downtime. If the message text is empty, no message will be displayed.
newAdminMaintenance.variables: *_You may use the following variables in the "Message text" field, which will be automatically substituted with useful values:
newAdminMaintenance.variable1: *_$TIME : The time component of "Maintenance time", converted to the user's local time (eg. "1:15:45 PM")
newAdminMaintenance.variable2: *_$DATE : The date component of "Maintenance time", converted to the user's local time (eg. "6/19/2015")
newAdminMaintenance.variable3: *_$IN_COUNTDOWN : An active countdown until "Maintenance time" (eg. "in 3 days" or "in 1 minute"). Displays "any moment" at the time specified in "Maintenance time" and then disappears after an hour.

maintenanceTime.label: *_Maintenance time:
maintenanceTime.subtext: *_The time you intend to start performing maintenance, formatted like "%s".

url.label: *_Link URL (optional):
url.subtext: *_If given, the maintenance message will render as a clickable link to the provided URL.

newAdminHostingManagement.explanation: *_This feature is experiemental and only works with the LDAP login provider at the moment. Use with caution.

quotaEnabled.label: *_Enable quota for users
quotaEnabled.subtext: *_Enable Quota management on this server. This requires both SAML and LDAP to be configured, and email addresses will be used to match between the two.

quotaLdapAttribute.label: *_LDAP quota attribute
quotaLdapAttribute.subtext: *_This is the attribute name that will be looked up from LDAP to determine quota for a user.

billingPromptUrl.label: *_Billing prompt url
billingPromptUrl.subtext: *_This is the url that will be used in the billing prompt.

appList.noMatchApp: *_You have no installed apps with that name. Try searching on the app market »
appList.unauthorizedText: *_This is a private Sandstorm server. In order to install apps, you need to be invited by the admin. The admin can invite you from the admin panel.
appList.intro:
*_Welcome!
Create documents, chat rooms, blogs, and more.

Get started by installing an app.

upgrade.explanation: *_You have an older version of this app installed.  Do you want to upgrade?

downgrade.explanation: *_You already have a newer version of this app installed.  Are you sure you want to revert to this older version?

newerVersion.explanation: *_Some of your files were made with a newer version of this app.  They will keep using the newer version, as going backwards could break them.

olderVersion.explanation: *_Some of your grains were made with an older version of this app.  Upgrade them?

trash.explanation: *_Grains will be permanently removed after 30 days in the trash. To keep a grain, restore it to the Main list.

noGrains.inTrash: *_Some grains in your trash match your search.

sandstormAppDetails.hasFingerprint: *_The app publisher has proven using PGP that they control these accounts.
sandstormAppDetails.noFingerprint: *_This app has no signature from its creator; its author cannot be verified.

deletePopup.title: *_Delete your account
deletePopup.explanation: *_You are about to mark your account for deletion. Once marked for deletion, your account will be suspended, and you will have 7 days to cancel the pending deletion by logging back into your account.
deletePopup.results: *_After 7 days, your account will be permanently deleted. Deleting your account will:
deletePopup.result3: *_Remove you from all users' contact lists
deletePopup.result4: *_Delete all credentials owned by your account (except credentials also associated with another account).
deletePopup.confirm: *_Please type "delete my account" below to confirm.
deletePopup.goodbye: *_We're sorry to see you go. Feel free to share any feedback you have with the server admin.

accountSuspended.title: *_This account has been suspended by you.
accountSuspended.deletedIn: *_This account will be deleted in %s. Would you like to cancel deletion and restore this account?
accountSuspended.suspended: *_This account is suspended and all of its grains and shares are disabled. Would you like to restore this account?

picture.label: *_Profile picture:
picture.subtext: *_This picture will be shown to other users to help identify you.

fullName.label: *_Full name:
fullName.subtext: *_Your regular first and last name, as you would like it displayed to others. This does not have to be your real name.

handle.label: *_Handle:
handle.hint: *_Handles must start with a lower-case letter and contain only lower-case letters, digits, and underscores.
handle.subtext: *_To be displayed in apps that use handles. Your handle must start with a letter and contain only lower-case letters, digits, and underscores.

agreedToTerms.agreeTo: *_ I have read and agree to the

demo.title: *_Create account
demo.explanation: *_Your demo data will be transferred to your new account.

shared.explanation: *_Sign in so that collaborators know who you are.

emailAuthenticationForm.hint: *_Passwordless E-mail Login allows you to log in using an e-mail address. No password is required; instead, every time you log in, we send you a new email confirmation code. You will only need to log in once per device.

token.explanation: *_We've sent a login e-mail to %s. It may take a few moments to show up in your inbox.
token.label: *_Enter your token:

emailAuthenticationForm.disabled: *_A server admin must enable email authentication before you can confirm your email.

username.label: имя пользователя
username.hint: *_This is your LDAP username. It will be the name that you normally use to log in to other internal services at your company.

password.label: пароль
password.hint: *_This is your LDAP password. It will be the password that you normally use to log in to other internal services at your company.

identityLoginInterstitial.title: Вход в систему…
identityLoginInterstitial.warning: *_but that is not a login credential for any account.
identityLoginInterstitial.moreIdentities: *_The following credentials can log in to your credential's accounts:

unlink.explanation: *_Are you sure you want to unlink your credential from the account of %s?

toggleLogin.label: *_Allow this credential to log in to your account.

show.explanation: *_This credential is shared with other accounts. Those accounts have the following login credentials:

hide.explanation: *_This credential is shared with at least one other account.

accountCardSignInButton.reSign: *_To sign out of your current account and sign in as this user, choose how to sign in:

_emailTokenError.title: *_Invalid authentication code. If it has been more than 15 minutes, the token has expired, otherwise you may have simply mistyped it.

_emailLinkIdentityError.title: *_To confirm your email address, you must be logged in as the account that created this link.

setupWizardSystemLog.permissionDenied: Вы не можете просматривать системный журнал, потому что вы не вошли в систему как администратор и у вас нет токена установки.

noIdpEnabled.explanation: *_This Sandstorm server has been set up previously, but due to a change in sandstorm.conf, you'll need to configure login providers again.

idpEnabled.explanation: *_This Sandstorm server is ready to roll. You can adjust server settings, including which providers are enabled and how Sandstorm sends email.
idpEnabled.turnUserIntoAdmin: *_You can also turn an existing user into an administrator.

isNotAdmin.explanation: Чтобы сделать аккаунт администратором, пожалуйста, войдите в систему:

setupWizardIdentity.title: *_Login providers
setupWizardIdentity.explanation1: *_To use Sandstorm, you need to create a user account.  Every user account on Sandstorm is backed by an login provider.  You'll use this login provider to authenticate as the first administrator of this Sandstorm install.
setupWizardIdentity.explanation2: *_Configure the login provider or providers you wish to enable.

emailToggle.label: Пользователи, аутентифицированы по адресом электронной почты
emailToggle.subtext: Примечание: отключено, поскольку вход по электронной почтой не сконфигурирован.

emailDomain.label: Домен:
emailDomain.subtext: Пользователи с адресом электронной почты на этом домене будут членами организации этого сервера.

gappsToggle.label: Пользователи, аутентифицированы по GSuite
gappsToggle.subtext: Примечание: отключено, поскольку Google Sign-In не сконфигурировано.

gappsDomain.label: Домен:
gappsDomain.subtext: *_Users with a Google Apps for Work account under this domain will be members of this server's organization.

ldapToggle.label: *_Users authenticated via LDAP
ldapToggle.subtext: *_Note: disabled because LDAP login is not configured.

samlToggle.label: *_Users authenticated via SAML
samlToggle.subtext: *_Note: disabled because SAML login is not configured.

disallowGuests.label: Запретить сотрудничество с пользователями за пределами организации.
disallowGuests.subtext: Пользователям будет необходимо войти в систему как член вашей организации, чтобы просмотреть ссылки для обмена.  Гостевой доступ будет отключен.

shareContacts.label: *_Make all organization users visible to each other
shareContacts.subtext: *_This setting automatically adds users within the organization to each other's contact list so that they can share grains with each other.  Disable this if you have some users whose identity should stay hidden from other users.

setupWizardEmailConfig.title: Доставка электронной почты
setupWizardEmailConfig.explanation: *_Sandstorm needs a way to send email.  You can skip this step (unless you're using email login), but email-related features will be unavailable until you configure email in the future.
setupWizardEmailConfig.moreDetail: *_How Sandstorm uses email: Sandstorm sends email notifications, and Sandstorm apps can send email notifications, too. Every app receives a unique email address, so Sandstorm needs to send email from a variety of "From:" addresses. Therefore, Gmail SMTP won't work, but there are other free services. See more info in the docs.

hostPort.subtext: Используете порт 25 для SMTP (или незашифрованные или с StartTLS) или порт 465 для SMTPS TLS-шифрованием.

email.label: *_Sandstorm server's own email address
email.subtext: *_Sandstorm will send login emails, notifications of granted access requests, and other emails from this address. It will also use this address in the SMTP envelope.

setupWizardPreinstalled.title: Настройка предустановленных приложений
setupWizardPreinstalled.explanation: *_Please wait while Sandstorm installs the following Productivity Suite apps that are useful for most users. You will be able to configure all pre-installed apps in the Admin Settings panel after setup.

setupWizardLoginUser.title: Создать учётную запись администратора
setupWizardLoginUser.isAdmin: Отлично!  Ваша учетная запись имеет права администратора.

hasAdmin.explanation: Этот сервер Sandstorm уже имеет администратора, но если вы хотите, вы также можете сделать себя администратором.

setupWizardLoginUser.makeYouAnAdmin: *_Making you an admin on this server...

loggedOut.explanation: *_You can now create an admin account on this Sandstorm server.
loggedOut.description: Войти, чтобы создать свою учётную запись администратора

setupWizardSuccess.title: Готов ехать!
setupWizardSuccess.whatsNext: Что бы вы хотели сделать дальше?

setupWizardVerifyToken.title: Проверка токена…
setupWizardVerifyToken.explanation: Извините, похоже, что срок вашего токена установки истек.
setupWizardVerifyToken.howToFix: Теперь создайте новый из командной строки, запустив sandstorm admin-token для доступа к мастеру установки.

setupWizardTokenExpired.title: Требуется токен установки
setupWizardTokenExpired.alreadySetup: *_This server is already set up, so we recommend administering it via the main
setupWizardTokenExpired.explanation: *_To use this server's setup page, you need a valid setup token.
setupWizardTokenExpired.howToFix: *_Generate a new one now from the command line by running sandstorm admin-token and following the link it outputs.

topbar.updated: Sandstorm обновлено — Нажмите здесь, чтобы перезагрузить
topbar.oasis: *_Start collaborating with others by using Sandstorm on Oasis:
topbar.selfHostHint: *_Or, run Sandstorm on your own server (it's open source):

powerbox.title: Запрос Powerbox
powerbox.noGrain: Ни одна песчинка не может предоставить запрошенный интерфейс.
